forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 66F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 67F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High around 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. Areas of fog developing after midnight. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
